name: Smol Defense Demo
description:
This is the demo for a tower defense game which tries not to be an RTS. It was supposed to be an exercise in scope restraint but heh , still manageable so far.

Controls are :

  • W/A/S/D   to move the camera
  • H  to center the camera on the base
  • LMB  to interact with the UI
  • RMB to build/select/destroy buildings
